author: jlaskowski
msg: Add the license and the @version tag

author: gdamour
msg: o Supports the alt-dd element associated to a module via an EAR deployment descriptor;
o Updates geronimo-application.xsd such that it is possible to provide an optional alt-dd element defining
an alternate Geronimo specific deployment descriptor for each module defined by an EAR deployment descriptor; and
o Impacts JettyModuleBuilder and ConnectorModuleBuilder accordingly to use the alternate deployment

author: gdamour
msg: Remove a cast no more required.

author: gdamour
msg: o Supports deployment of unpacked EARs. An unpacked EAR can contain either (standard) packed or unpacked
o Gets rid of the ModuleBuilderWithUnpack interface as OpenEJB supports by now deployment of unpacked EJB JAR.

author: djencks
msg: Implement non-link ejb refs and ejb local refs.  In the geronimo dd, target-name must be the entire object name of the target ejb
